model

Class Layer

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Layer

  • public class Layer
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represents a layer in the context of tile-based maps, in which a layer implementation gives a new dimension to the 2D world, allowing 2D objects to be positioned and drawn on top of another in an organized and controlled way, without much complication.
    Since:
    0.3
    Author:
    Pedro Sampaio

    • Constructor Detail

      • Layer

        public Layer()
        Default constructor

      • Layer

        public Layer(float zIndex,
             float opacity)
        Constructor with layer parameters
        Parameters:
        zIndex - the z-index (depth) of the layer: bigger indexes on top of smaller indexes
        opacity - the current opacity of the layer (for visualization tweaks in the viewport)

      • Layer

        public Layer(Tile[][] tiles,
             float zIndex,
             float opacity)
        Constructor with layer parameters
        Parameters:
        tiles - the tiles data for the layer
        zIndex - the z-index (depth) of the layer: bigger indexes on top of smaller indexes
        opacity - the current opacity of the layer (for visualization tweaks in the viewport)
